movie_title: The Worst Evil Henchman of All Time - Key & Peele
introduction:
A villain’s lackey tries to get involved in one of his boss’s torture sessions.
 
About Key & Peele:

vocabulary.definition: exemption from punishment or freedom from the injurious consequences of an action
vocabulary.example: The corrupt official acted with impunity, knowing that no one would hold him accountable.

vocabulary.definition: very appropriate to a particular situation
vocabulary.example: His comment was apropos given the context of the conversation.
The intimidating presence of the security guard deterred any troublemakers.

vocabulary.definition: the action or practice of inflicting severe pain or suffering on someone as a punishment or in order to force them to do or say something
vocabulary.example: The prisoner endured hours of torture before finally giving in to the demands.
The chef prepared an exquisite meal that delighted all the guests.

vocabulary.definition: tools or instruments used for a specific purpose
vocabulary.example: The carpenter organized his implements neatly in the workshop.
